Package edu.um.cps2002.tile_game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    The Game class performs all the logic of the game, taking care of the setting up of players, all interactions between the players and the map, and the generation of HTML code.
    GameMap
    The GameMap class implements a Map object, with the additional method GameMap.generate() which randomly creates a game map with grass and water tiles, and one treasure tile.
    GameMapTest
    The GameMapTest class tests the functionality of methods in the GameMap class.
    GameTest
    The GameTest class tests the functionality of methods in the Game class.
    Launcher
    The Launcher class contains the main method, which creates an instance of Game and loops through gameplay rounds until someone wins.
    Map
    The Map class contains a two-dimensional array of char entries referred to as tiles and some simple methods common to both the map used by the Game class and the individual Players.
    Player
    The Player class contains a copy of the game map from the player's perspective, the location of the player on the map, various methods which allow the player to move around the map and a method to generate the HTML code of the player's map.
    PlayerMap
    The PlayerMap class implements a Map object, with the additional methods PlayerMap.generate() which populates the map with undiscovered (?) characters and PlayerMap.htmlMapTable(int, int) which generates an HTML table representation of the map.
    PlayerMapTest
    The PlayerMapTest class tests the functionality of methods in the PlayerMap class.
    PlayerTest
    The PlayerTest class tests the functionality of methods in the Player class.
